front.title: Data Fields for DetNet Enhanced Data Plane

abstract.t: The DetNet-specific metadata should be carried in enhanced data plane based on the enhancement requirements. This document proposes the common DetNet data fields and option types such as Aggregation Option and Deterministic Latency Option. The common DetNet Data-Fields can be encapsulated into a variety of protocols such as MPLS, IPv6 and SRv6 networks.
